mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `member` (member_email, member_name, member_grant) VALUES (#{member_email}, #{member_name}, (SELECT grant_id FROM `grant` WHERE grant_name = 'USER'));
mapper.select: select a.member_id, a.member_email, a.member_name, b.grant_id, b.grant_name , a.create_date, a.update_date, a.act_flg, a.del_flg from `member` a inner join `grant` b on a.member_grant = b.grant_id where a.member_email = #{member_email}
select count(member_id) from `member` where member_name = #{member_name} and act_flg = 1 and del_flg = 0

SELECT `member`.`member_id`, `member`.`member_email`, `member`.`member_name`, `member`.`create_date`, `member`.`update_date`, `grant`.`grant_name`, `member`.`act_flg`, `member`.`del_flg`, `grant`.`grant_name` as 'member_grant' FROM `gyobab`.`member` INNER JOIN `gyobab`.`grant` ON `member`.`member_grant` = `grant`.`grant_id`
